Sunscourge Champion.text:

Desert of the True.name: Desert of the True
Desert of the True.text:
Desert of the True enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Desert of the Indomitable.name: Desert of the Indomitable
Desert of the Indomitable.text:
Desert of the Indomitable enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
Cycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Life Goes On.flavor:
"If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate
Life Goes On.name: Life Goes On
Life Goes On.text: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.

Oketra's Last Mercy.flavor: To the end, all Oketra did was for others.
Oketra's Last Mercy.name: Oketra's Last Mercy
Oketra's Last Mercy.text: Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

Hour of Revelation.flavor: In the first moments, the gate to the afterlife opened, and the people were prostrate in the light of the God-Pharaoh.
Hour of Revelation.name: Hour of Revelation
Hour of Revelation.text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if there are ten or more nonland permanents on the battlefield.
Destroy all nonland permanents.

Hour of Promise.flavor: With the Hekma breached and its protection removed, the deserts swept in.
Hour of Promise.name: Hour of Promise
Hour of Promise.text: Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control three or more Deserts, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

Crypt of the Eternals.flavor: The dead entered as worthy. They exited as Eternals.
Crypt of the Eternals.name: Crypt of the Eternals
Crypt of the Eternals.text:
When Crypt of the Eternals enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh.name: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh.text:
+2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
+1: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
−4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.
−12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

The Scorpion God.name: The Scorpion God
The Scorpion God.text:
Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
{1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature.
When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

The Locust God.name: The Locust God
The Locust God.text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste.
{2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

The Scarab God.name: The Scarab God
The Scarab God.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
{2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.
When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

Razaketh's Rite.flavor: "The blood ritual is complete. The end approaches."
Razaketh's Rite.name: Razaketh's Rite
Razaketh's Rite.text:
Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Torment of Hailfire.name: Torment of Hailfire
Torment of Hailfire.text: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

Hour of Devastation.flavor:
"Everything here exists or perishes at my whim. Including you, Gatewatch."
—Nicol Bolas
Hour of Devastation.name: Hour of Devastation
Hour of Devastation.text: All creatures lose indestructible until end of turn. Hour of Devastation deals 5 damage to each creature and each non-Bolas planeswalker.

Torment of Scarabs.flavor: Like a carpet unrolling for their god, the scarabs poured out from the necropolis.
Torment of Scarabs.name: Torment of Scarabs
Torment of Scarabs.text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.

Frontline Devastator.flavor: The God-Pharaoh's benevolence concealed the factory he created to produce an army of Eternals.
Frontline Devastator.name: Frontline Devastator
Frontline Devastator.text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
{1}{R}: Frontline Devastator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Neheb, the Eternal.flavor:
"This is what glory looks like."
—Nicol Bolas
Neheb, the Eternal.name: Neheb, the Eternal
Neheb, the Eternal.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, add {R} for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

Spellweaver Eternal.flavor:
"They were once our brothers and sisters."
—Etha, former Rhet-crop initiate
Spellweaver Eternal.name: Spellweaver Eternal
Spellweaver Eternal.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)

Eternal of Harsh Truths.flavor:
"If creating the Eternals was Bolas's plan here, what is his plan for the Eternals?"
—Jace Beleren
Eternal of Harsh Truths.name: Eternal of Harsh Truths
Eternal of Harsh Truths.text:
Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)
Whenever Eternal of Harsh Truths attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.

Proven Combatant.flavor: "It's not wise to keep glory waiting."
Proven Combatant.name: Proven Combatant
Proven Combatant.text: Eternalize {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

Champion of Wits.name: Champion of Wits
Champion of Wits.text:
When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards.

Dreamstealer.name: Dreamstealer
Dreamstealer.text:
Menace
Whenever Dreamstealer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards.
Eternalize {4}{B}{B} ({4}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

Ammit Eternal.name: Ammit Eternal
Ammit Eternal.text:
Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a -1/-1 counter on Ammit Eternal.
Whenever Ammit Eternal deals combat damage to a player, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

Razaketh, the Foulblooded.flavor: Liliana insisted on coming to Amonkhet to confront one of the two remaining demons to whom she is bound.
Razaketh, the Foulblooded.name: Razaketh, the Foulblooded
Razaketh, the Foulblooded.text:
Flying, trample
Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
